title: PWA Manifest & Service Worker Foundation
description: Set up PWA foundation: manifest.json, app icons, service worker via vite-plugin-pwa, and offline fallback.
acceptance_criteria: manifest.json with: name 'HomeHub', icons (192px, 512px), theme_color '#630606', background_color '#F5F2E7', display 'standalone'
iOS meta tags for PWA (<meta name='apple-mobile-web-app-capable'>, splash screens)
vite-plugin-pwa installed and configured in vite.config.ts
Service worker: precache app shell, network-first for API calls
Offline fallback page displays when disconnected
App installable on Android Chrome and iOS Safari
Standalone mode works (no browser chrome visible)
files_to_touch: public/icons/ (create app icons in required sizes)
index.html (add manifest link, iOS meta tags)
notes: Generate icons from the app logo in multiple sizes: 72, 96, 128, 144, 152, 192, 384, 512. Use maskable icon variant for Android.
